I rise today in support of H.R. 250. The bipartisan legislation would  direct the Joint Committee on the Library, as Mr. Steil said, to  procure a statue of Benjamin Franklin for placement in the Capitol to  be observed by all those blessed to come and tour the United States  Capitol.
